example[0]: Economists predict that house prices will remain static for a long period.
definition[1]: noise caused by electricity in the air that blocks or spoils the sound from radio or TV
definition[3]: complaints or opposition to a plan, situation, or action
example[1]: His promotion has caused a lot of static.
definition[4]: not moving, changing, or developing, especially when movement or change would be good
example[2]: Economists predict that house prices will remain static for some time.
